metadata.dc:author: Ruiz de Burgos Moreno, Juan-Evangelista
metadata.dc:description: During my training in the University Clinic of Urology in Munich and Gro-Bhodern Hospital I could realize the prestige Dr. Cifuentes Delatte had among my professors, who in addition to knowing him personally made frequent references to his scientific works. I write in detail the time I met him during my admission in the Royal Academy of Medicine as a correspondent academician and the conversations we had during the sessions of the Academy, as well as the friendship I finally had with him.
metadata.dc:title: Breve semblaza y recuerdo del profesor Cifuentes Delatte, como miembro de la Real Academia Nacional de Medicina.
[Brief life sketch and memories of professor Dr. Luis Cifuentes Delatte, as a member of the National Royal Academy of Medicine].
